#Assigning operators Week1
```{r}

x <- 10
print(x)

y <- 3.6
print(y)

string_a <- "Hello World"
print(string_a)

cat ("Hi this is my first mark down using cat function")

# Addtion
a <- 3
b <- 7
result <- a + b
cat("Addition of ", a ,"and", b , "is", result)
 
 # Subtraction
a <- 3
b <- 7
result <- a - b
 
cat("Subtraction of", a ,"and", b , "is", result)

 # Multiplication
a <- 6
b <- 8
result <- a * b
 
cat("Multiplication of", a ,"and", b , "is", result)

 # Division
a <- 36
b <- 5
result <- a / b
 
cat("Division of", a ,"and", b , "is", result)

```
